meanings.definition: An impression or mark made by the hand.
meanings.sent1: The child proudly showed off his colorful handprint on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The detective found a mysterious handprint on the window.
meanings.sent3: The handprint on the cake was a sweet surprise for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: Her handprint on my heart will never fade away.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully studied the handprint in the clay to capture its details.

meanings.definition: A representation of a hand, especially as a design or decoration.
meanings.sent1: The cave paintings included a handprint symbolizing unity.
meanings.sent2: She got a handprint tattoo on her wrist as a symbol of strength.
meanings.sent3: The handprint on the flag was a unique touch to the design.
meanings.sent4: His handprint on the wall added a personal touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The handprint on the pottery was beautifully crafted with intricate details.

meanings.definition: To leave an impression or mark with one's hand.
meanings.sent1: She carefully handprinted her signature on the contract.
meanings.sent2: The artist handprinted her name on the bottom corner of the painting.
meanings.sent3: He handprinted his initials on the wet cement for fun.
meanings.sent4: The child handprinted a message in the sand before the waves washed it away.
meanings.sent5: The potter handprinted a delicate pattern on the ceramic vase.
